name: vImage.BufferType
desc: Codes that represent vImage buffer types.

items.name: init?(bufferTypeCode: Int, model: CGColorSpaceModel?)
items.desc: Creates a buffer type enumeration from the specified code and color space model.

items.name: init?(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Creates a buffer type enumeration from the specified integer raw value.

items.name: case Cb
items.desc: The buffer contains the blue chrominance channel.

items.name: case Cr
items.desc: The buffer contains the red chrominance channel.

items.name: case YCbCr
items.desc: The buffer contains interleaved luminance and both chroma channels.

items.name: case alpha
items.desc: The buffer contains the alpha channel or coverage component.

items.name: case chroma
items.desc: The buffer contains the interleaved chrominance channels.

items.name: case chunky
items.desc: The buffer contains chunky data.

items.name: case cmykBlack
items.desc: The buffer contains the black channel.

items.name: case cmykCyan
items.desc: The buffer contains the cyan channel.

items.name: case cmykMagenta
items.desc: The buffer contains the magenta channel.

items.name: case cmykYellow
items.desc: The buffer contains the yellow channel.

items.name: case coreGraphics
items.desc: The buffer contains a Core Graphics image.

items.name: case indexed
items.desc: The buffer contains data in an indexed colorspace.

items.name: case labA
items.desc: The buffer contains the a* channel.

items.name: case labB
items.desc: The buffer contains the b* channel.

items.name: case labL
items.desc: The buffer contains the L* channel.

items.name: case luminance
items.desc: The buffer contains only luminance data.

items.name: case monochrome
items.desc: The buffer contains monochrome data.

items.name: case rgbBlue
items.desc: The buffer contains the blue channel.

items.name: case rgbGreen
items.desc: The buffer contains the green channel.

items.name: case rgbRed
items.desc: The buffer contains the red channel.

items.name: case xyzX
items.desc: The buffer contains the X channel.

items.name: case xyzY
items.desc: The buffer contains the Y channel.

items.name: case xyzZ
items.desc: The buffer contains the Z channel.

items.name: var bufferTypeCode: vImageBufferTypeCode
items.desc: The type code of the buffer type.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the buffer type by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: static func != (vImage.BufferType, vImage.BufferType) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two buffer types are not equal.
